blind_sort_description: Sort 10 numbers from 1-50. You lose if the new number doesn't fit anywhere!
higher_lower_description: Guess if the next number will be higher or lower!
color_hunt_description: Find the target color! The text color might trick you!
add_games_to_favorites: Add games to favorites for quick access
aim_trainer_description: Try to shoot the randomly appearing red targets for 20 seconds. Each hit is 1 point!
number_memory_description: Memorize the sequence of numbers and enter it correctly using the keypad. How many digits can you remember?
find_difference_description: Find the one square with a different color. It gets harder with each round!
rock_paper_scissors_description: Play against the computer. First to 5 points wins.
twenty_one_description: Beat the dealer to 21! Get as close as possible without going over.
tap_to_start_guessing: Tap Higher or Lower to start guessing! Numbers are between 1-50.
play_games_to_see_scores: Play games to see your high scores here!
share_no_data: No data to share yet. Play some games first!
share_error: Error sharing achievements. Please try again.
